name: BreakUMine Demo
description:
PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS GAME TO HARM OR TRIGGER YOURSELF IN ANYWAY.

Welcome to the Break U Mine Demo! 

This game is a Dating sim with a horrible kinky twist - Those you are dating are serial killers, and you're their next victim. Inspired by Boyfriend To Death and it's Sequel, This game is a dark exploration of the mind. This game is rated 18+ due to mature content, and is not for the faint of heart. Route warnings are provided within the game, as well as external charts below. 

Here are the general warnings for the game. More detailed descriptions can be found within.  Please note that All routes will contain Physical Violence, Unhealthy Viewpoints, Bloody Descriptions, and Major Character Death!

Further updates will be released soon! 

Thank you all very much for your support. 

Made with Inkle. Current Demo Length - 10,000+ Words.
